text:
The USYK Collection is dropping on Fuse, inside Telegram.

Six stickers. Six moods. Six sides of Usyk.

The whitelist is now open, and there are two ways to join:

1️⃣ [Fuse Mini App](https://t.me/fuse/store?startapp=collection_558b9db3-3a26-41d8-8840-d462b3748f5d) → Enter the raffle for your chance to win a spot.

2️⃣ [Ready to Pay Mini App](https://t.me/RT_Pay_bot?start=UmpobEtaQw) → Sign up to Usyk's 'Ready to Pay Mini App' and spend $50 for a guaranteed whitelist spot.

This is a new part of Usyk’s journey, made collectible.

Be among the first to enter.
